body_html:
@aru132 Thanks for your comments. Indeed, the GDR plugin is developed under RDMA over Converged Ethernet (RoCE) environment, and it assumes the IP address user passes to the GRPC server could also be used for RDMA.

Standalone IB without IPoIB fails to satisfy this condition, so error arises from the GRPC side.

Btw, it would be much appreciated if you could contribute to the docs of GDR, as I currently have no access to any IB cluster.
